directions: Whisk together lime juice, soy sauce, ginger, sugar, and oil in a large bowl. Add remaining ingredients and toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: 1 1/2 tablespoons finely minced peeled fresh ginger
1/2 lb soba noodles, freshly cooked to tender, rinsed under cold water, and drained
title: Soba Salad with Carrot and Zucchini
